subject: ghost antenna  for evp in photo section
author: kenneth b thomas
full_text:
basically center tapped spider web spiral loop.  outer half is left 
unconnected ("parasitic")

covered in bearden bedini book "free energy generation"  also in 
numerous tech and physics papers from 1909 to now.


whats significant is that this antenna can intercept and resonate RF  
which is not quite fully in our time domain or universe.; radiant rf, 
etheric rf, near field curl, internally bent photon
